metadata.name: infinite route to school -pink-
metadata.description: I used the 'Penrose Stairway' depicted in M. C. Escher's 'Ascending and Descending' as a school route to depict female students from different eras continuing to commute to school. Influenced by the current world situation, I tried not to be heavy-handed in my depiction of the people.

attributes.value: MITSUI FUDOSAN 80th Anniversary FUTURE SPECIAL ZONE PROJECT
